CustomField.description: Enable this setting to hide the Social Identity option for agreements. Social Identity verification requires signers to verify their identity by signing in to one of the following sites: Facebook, Google, LinkedIn, Twitter, Yahoo! or Microsoft Live.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this setting to hide the Web Identity option for agreements. Web Identity verification requires signers to verify their identity by signing in to one of the following sites: Facebook, Google, LinkedIn, Twitter, Yahoo! or Microsoft Live.)
CustomField.label: Disable Social Identity Verification
